text: Ardell William Diessner (born July 28, 1923) is an American politician and doctor in the state of Minnesota. He was born in Minneapolis, Minnesota. He served in the Minnesota State Senate from 1983 to 1990 as a member of the Democratic–Farmer–Labor Party, representing district 56. Diessner is a medical doctor, having graduated from the University of Minnesota. ==References== Category:1923 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Minneapolis Category:People from Washington County, Minnesota Category:University of Minnesota alumni Category:Physicians from Minnesota Category:Minnesota Democrats Category:Minnesota state senators
title: Bill Diessner
